description:
In preparation for the third exam that starts in a month, Naruto`s former mentor, Kakashi, chooses Ebisu to train the young ninja.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ebisu Futatabi! Harenchi wa Watashi ga Yurushimasenzo!
Ebisu Returns: Naruto`s Toughest Training Yet!
เรื่องไร้ยางอาย ผมอภัยให้ไม่ได้
エビス再び! ハレンチは私が許しませんぞ!
